Product Description

Leotachi is a professional manufacturer of waterproof bathroom mirror TVs.

Waterproof Touch Screen Mirror TV for Bathroom

Screen Support 360° Rotation（New upgrade）Lock Screen Function（New upgrade）High-Speed Processor RK3288 (Smooth Operation）Touch Screen and IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Double Control)Automatic Defogging FunctionIP66 High-grade Waterproof

Upgraded mirror TV

Bright and Clear Screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and 500nits high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers(10w), Leotachi TV provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.

Luxury bathroom mirror tv

When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a Multifunctional TV and a luxury mirror at the same time.

Multipurpose mirror tv

Leotachi mirror TV has advanced performance, can support watching movies, listening to music, playing games, etc.,

Different Bathroom Mirror TV – 360° rotating

IP66 waterproof 1080P bathroom mirror TV system supports rotating the screen by 360°. We also recommend that you can choose a 360° rotating bracket (Available at Leotachi stores), and you can switch the angle and distance you want at will.

Multiple layers of materials are superimposed to make it waterproof and fog-proof

Package included:

When you receive the goods, please carefully confirm whether it is complete.

1 x 21.5inch Bathroom Mirror waterproof TV 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control(Need extra CR2025 battery)） 1 x Wall Bracket 1 x Installation Manual 1 x DC 12V Adapter

Professional Waterproof Level Mirror TV

A waterproof TV that is safe to use around humid environment. The TV is typically sealed in such a way that they can be splashed, rained on, submerged in water and other liquids and still function.

1. Waterproof Level : IP66 2. Overall size : 515(W)*312(H)*36(D)mm / 23.7 inch 3. Screen size: 476(W)-268(D)mm / 21.5 inch 4. Resolution: 1920*1080 5. Net Weight: 5.5KG 6. Working Temperature: -40 ~76°C 7. Power consumption : 60W (standby≤1W) 8. Speaker Power: 10w*2.

For Women

You can use Leotachi’ TV to watch your favorite movies or short videos.

For Men

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite competitions or news

For Kids

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite cartoons or play games

For Family

You can use Leotachi’TV to improve family harmony and get everyone in the family to love bathing!

IMPORTANT NOTICE

· Mirrors Damaged/Chipped on Arrival,No return needed.

· All you need to do is sending us photos.We will provide you with the most satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

· Please check the outer package while receiving, only accept whole package. And please check whether the mirror is intact.、

【Upgraded Smooth Touch Screen System】The mirror TV is a 10-point touch screen technology that supports a variety of gestures, you can also freely choose touch screen or remote control. The system uses a high-speed processor RK3288 – Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17 architecture to ensure smooth operation when using.
【Upgraded Brightness and Volume】Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V adapter, The brightness of 500cd/m2 is brighter than similar products on the market, bringing you different visual effects; in addition, the dual-speaker design allows you to hear clearly in noisy environments; better heat dissipation fast and prolong the service life of the product.
【Multifunctional luxury mirror】 When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a multifunction TV and a luxury mirror at the same time. Leotachi’s TV has a professional-grade IP66 waterproof rating, and the screen is automatically defogged without additional operation. especially suitable for some wet or extreme places, such as bathroom, shower, kitchen, swimming pool, yacht, sauna, spa, hot tub, steam room, etc.
【Installation and After Sales】 The Leotachi Bathroom TV comes with a wall mount bracket that can be easily installed in a wall recess or fixed to the wall by just one person. leotachi Bathroom TV is professionally certified and we offer a 1 year warranty. Please feel free to contact us for more details, all messages will be answered within 24 hours.

Leotachi Waterproof Mirror TV

    We are committed to offer our customers a variety of Leotachi TV. We always keep an eye on the latest trends in TV and put our customers’ wishes first.

Product Description

Meteor Shower Laser Light Projector

Indoor Use

Outdoor Stake Mounted

Wall Mounted

Specification

Applicable Voltage: 120v 60hz

Power Adapter: 3.6V 5.4W

Power Cord Length: 16.4ft

Laser Wavelength: Red Laser 650nm; Green Laser 532nm

Laser Classification: Class ǁ

Operating Temperature: -4℉ to 105℉

Material: Aluminum Alloy & ABS Plastic

Waterproof Level: IP65

Package Contents 1* Laser Light 1* Ground Stake 1* Remote Control 1* AC Adapter 1* Instruction Manual 1* 16.4ft Power Cord

Installation Tutorial:

Insert the pole part through the circular ring part into the hole. Then rotate counterclockwise to

tighten it.

Landscape Light: Attach the light top to the light stake, rotate counterclockwise to tighten the nut. If the ground is hard or dry, water the soil along the area there the lights will be installed.

Allow the soil to soak for few hours. Then drive the stake into the ground. Don’t force the lights

into the ground as this might damage the stakes.

Connect with Light Base: Attach the light top to the light base, rotate clockwise to tighten it.

Adjust Angle: You can rotate the light head to desired angle.

Power Supply: Plug cord to power adapter connector, counterclockwise tighten the anti-water

dust cover.

【Plug and Play】Extremely easy to install, everybody can do it! 16ft long extension cord is so convenient for providing power from a distance!
【Weather Resistance】No worry about raining, snowing and frosting. IP65 shell and IP44 plug provides you waterproof and dustproof. Working temperature is -4℉ to 105℉.
【Indoor and Outdoor】It can be used for garden and house decoration, creating festival atmosphere for Halloween, Christmas, New Years, Birthday party, etc.
【Remote Control】You can control the light at a distance of about 30ft through a remote control. You can not only speed up to make the laser move faster, also speed down to make the laser to be static. Set the timer for 2H/4H/6H/8H to make the light on at dusk and off at dawn.

Meteor Shower Laser Light Projector

Outdoor Stake Mounted

Wall Mounted

Product Description

Haocrown 27 inch Bathroom TV Mirror with Smart Touch Screen

The big achievement of Haocrown waterproof bathroom TV is full touch screen which using projected capacitive 10-point touch technology for fluid response.

With updated H2 quad-core chipset and smooth touch brilliant screen, you can save more time and control the TV and enjoy more entertainment.

Even the TV screen is wet with water, you can easily and safely browse through all the available options, choose your favorite programs, change the volume and turn on/off the TV with simply touch control.

Control TV with Voice Remote

Come with IP68 waterproof remote and Bluetooth voice remote.

Built-in Dolby Atmos

Support external ceiling speakers, build up cinematic surround sound.

Easy to Connect

Easy to connect 5GHz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth, cable TV, external HDMI devices etc.

1 Voice Control 2 Built-in Dolby Atmos 3 Easy to Connect

Shared Experience from Our Customers Terrific Touchscreen Bath TV

The set’s image is bright and sharp. The mirror face when off and the picture when the TV set is on, both look great. Touchscreen feature is fabulous.

Excellent product

Very easy to fit. Picture is good, and it is magical when it sits behind the mirror. Looks great works great. Better than expected.

Working Good

Great product . Easy to set up and very easy to get on WiFi. Adding a speaker definitely improves the sound.

Bathroom Mirror TV

Love this TV in my bathroom. The mirror looks like a 100% mirror when TV is off.

LED Screen Display Size: 27 inch (Diagonal) Finished Surface： Mirror (High quality nano-silver glass) IP66 Waterproof Rating: Triple waterproof treatment, anti-fog, dust-proof Three Control Types: Full touch screen control & Bluetooth voice remote & IP68 Waterproof IR remote Built-in Smart System: Android 11.0 (Updated H2 Chip), better, smarter and safer RAM 8GB & ROM 64GB: Large memory support running smoother and more stable system. Wireless Connections: Dual band 5Ghz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth 4.2. Updated Highlight LED Screen: Brightness 500 offer brighter and vivid television picture quality. Resolution: 1920×1080, 16:9, 178° H/ V viewing angles. Cable TV Channel Support: Built-in ATSC tuner, support digital TV programmes. Speakers: Built-in two waterproof speakers(8Ω x 5W), support 3.5mm audio output interface. Support Interfaces: HDMI, LAN, TV Input, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Audio Output, DV 12V Input. Product Dimensions: 26.7 x 17.6 x 1.7 inch Package Weight: 33.5 bl Installations: Wall mounted or recessed into wall installations Package List: 1 x 27-inch Touchscreen Mirror TV, 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control, 1 x Bluetooth Remote, 1 x Embedded Bracket, 1 x Wall Bracket, 1 x Installation Manual, 1 x HDMI Cable

Safe Waterproof TV for Bathroom: All Haocrown waterproof TVs have passed IP66 high waterproof rating, triple waterproof treatment, anti-fog, dust proof and powered with safe low voltage DC 12V, which specially designed for using in any humid and dust conditions, such as luxury bathroom, saunas, hotel spa, kitchen etc.
2-IN-1 Vanishing TV Mirror Design: The bathroom TV is completely embedded within a luxury mirror. Vanishing glass technology makes it possible for a television to completely disappear when turned off. Haocrown high brightness 500 LED television panels are brighter than typical indoor TVs, delivering you smooth high-definition images.
Running Smart Android 11.0 System and HDTV Digital TV: Comes with smart Android 11.0 system in HDMI 2 channel, resolution 1920×1080, easy to connect dual band 5GHz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth, explore your favorite shows via rang of apps like YouTube, Netflix etc. RAM 8GB, ROM 64GB, upgraded H2 chip and large memory make ensure running programs better, smarter and safer. Built-in ATSC tuner, supports digital HDTV programs.
Easy to Install, Wall Mounts Inchuded: The 27 inch waterproof bathroom tv can be fitted either recessed mount (in wall) or surface mount (on wall). The package will come with both embedded bracket and wall bracket and full installation manual. We offer customized service and worry-free 12-month experience and 12-hour kindly customer response. Contact us by below steps: Go to the product page– click ” Haocrown-us” (under “Add to Cart”), then click “Ask a question”.

    With IP66 waterproof and powered with safe low voltage DC 12V specific design, updated smart mirror touch screen function, Haocrown waterproof indoor TVs are widely used luxury hotel, bathroom, shower, steam room any wet and humid conditions.

Price: $24.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 23:31:45 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MORE WAGS & MORE SMILES AQUAPAW PETS ARE HAPPY PETS

Among the dogs, cats, and other furry pals in our recent poll, Aquapaw is the paws-down favorite brand. Aquapaw bathing tools and lick mats take the scary out of things like baths and vet visits. Dogs love to smell good, of course, and Sparky’s skin doesn’t itch after an Aquapaw bath. Arf!

HAPPY PETS HAVE HAPPY HUMANS

Humans like it when their pets are happy. That’s why humans choose Aquapaw. Aquapaw baths are less messy than bucket baths. Vet visits and grooming sessions are just easier, with Slow Treater lick mats. And hey, it turns out humans also love it when dogs smell good. It’s a win-win situation.

EASY WAYS TO MAKE BATH TIME BETTER

1 Pro Pet Bather 2 Original Pet Bather 3 Slow Treater 4 Slow Treater XL 5 Feeding Mats

The Aquapaw Pet Bathing Tool

Simplify the dog bathing process at your home, with Aquapaw. Our combination sprayer/scrubber saves water, produces less mess, and helps your dog feel comfortable. All at the same time. Aquapaw is easy to install and operate. Can be used inside or outside.

PICK THE RIGHT SPRAYER FOR YOUR 4-LEGGED FRIEND

Original Sprayer

For cats & small dogs

Pro Sprayer

For all dogs

Equine Sprayer

For horses & big dogs

Eliminates mess and stress: As seen on Shark Tank, this all-in-one tool lets you brush and rinse your pet simultaneously, for faster bathing with no need for bucket rinsing. The button mechanism lets you click easily from ON to OFF with one hand, leaving your other hand free to soothe your pet
Indoor/outdoor use: Comes with adapters to fit shower spigot or garden hose, so you can easily create a small animal grooming station indoors in your tub or a large animal shower outside. Includes 8-foot hose
Ergonomic design: With its one-size-fits-all design, Aquapaw straps securely to either hand. The ON/OFF button rests in your palm, for ease of operation. The strap adjusts easily to fit all hand sizes
Quality materials and a great gift: The scrubber tool is 100% FDA-grade silicone – strong enough for scrubbing thick fur, yet soft enough to be gentle on your pet’s sensitive areas

MORE WAGS & MORE SMILES

AQUAPAW PETS ARE HAPPY PETS

Among the dogs, cats, and other furry pals in our recent poll, Aquapaw is the paws-down favorite brand. Aquapaw bathing tools and lick mats take the scary out of things like baths and vet visits. Dogs love to smell good, of course, and Sparky’s skin doesn’t itch after an Aquapaw bath. Arf!

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $79.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:41 UTC – Details)


The holidays are here and ‘tis the season to decorate your home but string lights are a struggle. Hanging lights is really hard work and takes too much time. Untangling them from the box is a pain and going out in the cold high up on a ladder quickly makes your joyous ho-ho-hos turn into bah-humbugs. When one bulb breaks, you need to check them all! Worse yet, during the day, your home’s appearance is ruined by ugly wires everywhere. But not anymore! From the number one laser decorating brand in the world comes the brand-new Star Shower Ultra 9 Laser Light Show, now with an incredible NINE different beautiful decorative light patterns for you to choose from. Star Shower Ultra 9 is the ORIGINAL laser light system that immerses your entire home from top to bottom with a galaxy of THOUSANDS of spectacular red and green lights! And it’s so easy! Just plug it in and turn it on. Your home can transform from dull to dazzling with a magical three-dimensional light field of beautiful crisp bright lights. Better yet, with Star Shower, you can have lights way up high on your house where no string light could ever reach. Star Shower even works on shrubbery and trees – higher than you could ever reach – making your home and yard look more festive than ever! Star Shower Ultra 9 covers up to 3200 square feet. For spectacular results use two or more Star Shower Ultra 9 units!
New 2022 Star Shower Model: From the makers of the best-selling holiday lights projector comes the newest, most innovative way to shower your home indoors and outdoors with thousands of brilliant, shining electric lights to create a winter wonderland of color
Fast, Easy Holiday Decorations: Holiday decorating with string lights is a tangled mess and if one light blows, they all go out; ditch the old holiday decorations with Star Shower Ultra 9 light projector, the fastest, easiest way to project thousands of festive laser lights onto your house
9 Light Patterns: Don’t be stuck with the same holiday decorations for all 25 days of Christmas; Star Shower Ultra 9 has 9 different patterns of holiday lights, so you can pick a new Christmas lights pattern every week or choose your favorite to shower your home through the holidays
